mapper.insert: insert into product (usernum, producttitle, productcontent, productprice, productaddress, categorynum, productcreatedat, productopenchat, productlocationx, productlocationy) values (#{usernum}, #{producttitle}, #{productcontent}, #{productprice}, #{productaddress}, #{categorynum}, now(), #{productopenchat}, #{productlocationx}, #{productlocationy})
